summary: Implements a neural radiance field model that uses Torch‑NGP positional encoding and separate multilayer perceptrons to predict density (sigma) and appearance features from input coordinates, supporting configurable activation, bounding box, blob parameters, and optional normal computation.
business_intent: Provides a high‑performance, configurable NeRF component for applications such as virtual view synthesis, 3D reconstruction, AR/VR content creation, and real‑time rendering pipelines.
